entry.source: 〉 There is a demon standing at the{F801}back of the room...{F801}{F802}〉 The demon seems wary of{F801}{F843,0}...{F801}{F802}〉 {F843,0} talks to the demon and{F801}explains the situation.{F801}
entry.target: 〉 There is a demon standing at the{F801}back of the room...{F801}{F802}〉 The demon seems wary of{F801}{F843,0}...{F801}{F802}〉 {F843,0} talks to the demon and{F801}explains the situation.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Mokoi\0{F87A,-474}{F813,1,495805}Pyro Jack's looking... for me?{F801}{F802}I see... Guess they're worrying{F801}about me.{F801}{F802}It's true. I used to help out weaker{F801}demons that were being attacked by{F801}other demons and humans.{F801}{F802}I got them to a safe place called{F801}Naraku. Well, safer, anyway.{F801}{F802}But, you know what? If the end, a{F801}Mokoi's still just a Mokoi. I was{F801}doing pretty good in the beginning...{F801}{F802}But I didn't stand a chance against{F801}the strong demons in Shibuya. It{F801}took everything I had to survive.{F801}{F802}I can't go back now. There's no way.{F801}{F802}I never meant to, but I guess I've{F801}become something of a hero to them.{F801}{F802}If I went back now, I wouldn't be a{F801}hero anymore.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Mokoi\0{F87A,-474}{F813,1,495805}Pyro Jack's looking... for me?{F801}{F802}I see... Guess they're worrying{F801}about me.{F801}{F802}It's true. I used to help out weaker{F801}demons that were being attacked by{F801}other demons and humans.{F801}{F802}I got them to a safe place called{F801}Naraku. Well, safer, anyway.{F801}{F802}But, you know what? If the end, a{F801}Mokoi's still just a Mokoi. It{F801}took everything I had to survive.{F801}{F802}I can't go back now. There's no way.{F801}{F802}I never meant to, but I guess I've{F801}become something of a hero to them.{F801}{F802}If I went back now, I wouldn't be a{F801}hero anymore.{F801}

entry.source: "You're just a Mokoi."{F801}"Your friends miss you."{F801}"You'll always be their hero."{F801}
entry.target: "You're just a Mokoi."{F801}"Your friends miss you."{F801}"You'll always be their hero."{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Mokoi\0{F87A,-474}{F813,1,495805}I know you're just repeating what{F801}I said, but it really bothers me{F801}to hear a human like you say that.{F801}{F802}Hey, I might not look like it, but{F801}where I'm from I was the baddest evil{F801}spirit around. Don't rile me up!{F801}{F802}......{F801}{F802}{F813,1,495800}Heh. I see what you're trying to{F801}do. Thanks, human.{F801}{F802}I guess it's about time I left this{F801}place, huh?{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Mokoi\0{F87A,-474}{F813,1,495805}I know you're just repeating what{F801}I said, but it really bothers me{F801}to hear a human like you say that.{F801}{F802}Hey, I might not look like it, but{F801}where I'm from I was the baddest evil{F801}spirit around. Don't rile me up!{F801}{F802}......{F801}{F802}{F813,1,495800}Heh. I see what you're trying to{F801}do. Thanks, human.{F801}{F802}I guess it's about time I left this{F801}place, huh?{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Mokoi\0{F87A,-474}{F813,1,495805}Miss me? You think they still miss{F801}someone like me? I gave up on them!{F801}{F802}......{F801}{F802}{F813,1,495800}I see... I guess it's more important{F801}to be alive as a friend than to be{F801}remembered as a hero...{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Mokoi\0{F87A,-474}{F813,1,495805}Miss me? You think they still miss{F801}someone like me? I gave up on them!{F801}{F802}......{F801}{F802}{F813,1,495800}I see... I guess it's more important{F801}to be alive as a friend than to be{F801}remembered as a hero...{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Mokoi\0{F87A,-474}{F813,1,495805}You say that...{F801}{F802}...but I didn't really do much.{F801}I'm not anybody great.{F801}{F802}......{F801}{F802}{F813,1,495800}Oh, man. What was I getting all hung{F801}up over?{F801}{F802}Thanks, human. I think I see what's{F801}really important now.{F801}

What was I getting all hung{F801}up over?{F801}{F802}Thanks, human. I think I see what's{F801}really important now.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Mokoi\0{F87A,-474}Okay, I get it.{F801}Night Mokoi's going home!{F801}
